boardgame.name: Ese Geijutsuka New York e Iku
A Fake Artist Goes to New York
エセ芸術家ニューヨークへ行く
가짜 예술가 뉴욕에 가다
boardgame.description: エセ芸術家ニューヨークへ行く _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; which is pronounced as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Ese Geijutsuka New York e Iku_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and can be translated as Fake Artist Goes to New York _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; is a party game for 5-10 players. Players take turns being the Question Master, whose role is to set a category, write a word within that category on dry erase cards, and hand those out to other players as artists. At the same time, one player will have only an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;X_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; written on his card: they are the fake artist!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players will then go around the table twice, drawing one contiguous stroke each on a paper to draw the word established by the Question Master, then guess who the fake artist is. If the fake artist is not caught, both the fake artist and the Question Master earn points; if the fake artist is caught and cannot guess what the word is, the artists earn points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

What Did You Play This Week Podcast Thing Week 80

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I will work with you to ship the most cost efficient way or however you prefer. If the item is a small card game or smaller board board the shipping will be USPS First Class and will be around $5 total with shipping materials.

Bonkers party game where players try to illustrate a word co-operatively, taking turns to add a bit to the drawing. The problem is that the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;fake_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know what the word is, but must try not to be identified. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s clever fun. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £12.50 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £4.92 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £4.10 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £5.60 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £5.15 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
